headline.main: Smuts Urges Britain to Seek Ties In Europe to Match Soviet and U.S.; SMUTS ASKS BRITISH TO SEEK SATELLITES

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Dec. 2 -- Jan Christiaan Smuts, Prime Minister of the Union of South Africa and War Cabinet member, has suggested that Britain strengthen her position in western Europe lest she become a weak and unequal partner in the "great trinity of powers" -- Britain, the United States and Russia.
abstract: United Kingdom branch hears Prime Min Smuts
